Title: Fake It Till You Fake It Some More
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Tara Herrmann, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Rumors fly among the inmates about a new, higher-paying job assignment, especially when they have to take a test for it.
